EnhancedContent:
## Compare and integrate the cutting edge models from OpenAI right in VS Code

AI Toolkit v0.18.3 is here‚Äîand it‚Äôs a major milestone. This release introduces full support for:

- The **latest GPT-5 family of models**
- **OpenAI‚Äôs open-source models (GPT OSS)** via Azure AI Foundry and ONNX Runtime

Whether you're building in the cloud, on the edge, or experimenting locally, this update gives you more flexibility, performance, and choice than ever.

## üß† GPT-5 Models: Now in AI Toolkit

The **GPT-5 model family** is now fully integrated into AI Toolkit and available via **GitHub**, **Azure AI Foundry**, or **OpenAI**.

### ‚ú® Model Overview:

- **[gpt-5:](https://github.com/marketplace/models/azure-openai/gpt-5)**Advanced reasoning for analytics, LLM orchestration, and code generation.
- **[gpt-5-mini:](https://github.com/marketplace/models/azure-openai/gpt-5-mini)**A cost-effective, low-latency model ideal for real-time agents and lightweight tools.
- **[gpt-5-nano:](https://github.com/marketplace/models/azure-openai/gpt-5-nano)**Built for speed and concise reasoning‚Äîgreat for retrieval, Q&A, and compact workflows.
- **[gpt-5-chat (preview):](https://github.com/marketplace/models/azure-openai/gpt-5-chat)**Enables natural, multimodal, multi-turn conversations with persistent context‚Äîperfect for agentic apps.

## üß¨ GPT OSS Models: Open-Source Power, Local & Cloud-Ready

For the first time, **OpenAI‚Äôs open-source models (GPT OSS)** are available through:

- **Azure AI Foundry** for cloud-scale deployment
- **Windows AI Foundry with ONNX Runtime** for local inference

### üß© Model Overview:

- **[gpt-oss-120b](https://ai.azure.com/catalog/models/gpt-oss-120b)**(via Azure AI Foundry)
- Text-in/text-out open-weight model
- Reasoning with chain-of-thought
- Adjustable reasoning effort (low/medium/high)
- Structured output support
- API-compatible with Responses format
- **[gpt-oss-20b-cuda-gpu](https://ai.azure.com/catalog/models/gpt-oss-20b-cuda-gpu)**(via Local ONNX Runtime)
- CUDA-optimized local inference
- RTN quantization for performance
- Ideal for Windows + edge deployments

üìñ Read more: [OpenAI‚Äôs GPT OSS now on Azure AI and Windows Foundry](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/blog/openais-open%E2%80%91source-model-gpt%E2%80%91oss-on-azure-ai-foundry-and-windows-ai-foundry/)

## üß™ Explore, Compare, and Build Faster

With this release, AI Toolkit makes it easier to explore and integrate both GPT-5 and GPT OSS models:

- üîç **Compare GPT-5 models** in the catalog with others to find the best fit
- üí° **Use the View Code feature** to generate ready-to-run SDK snippets in Python, JavaScript, and more

## üîó Get Started Now

Update to **AI Toolkit v0.18.3** and unlock:

- GPT-5 model family via GitHub, Azure AI, or OpenAI
- GPT OSS models for open-source, cloud, and local development
- Model Playground tools for comparison and code generation

AI Toolkit continues to evolve as the fastest way to experiment, integrate, and ship AI into your applications‚Äîcloud or edge, closed or open-source.

Have questions or want to share feedback? üìö [Explore our docs](https://aka.ms/aitoolkit-docs) or leave us feedback on [GitHub](https://github.com/microsoft/vscode-ai-toolkit).

Updated Aug 08, 2025

Version 1.0

Title: GPT-5 Family of Models & GPT OSS Are Now Available in AI Toolkit for VS Code
Author: junjieli
Description:
